'''Radiant Spincrystal 88''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]].<!--to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].-->

It is located beneath the [[Ruin Golem (Desert of Hadramaveth)|Ruin Golem]]'s original location in the [[Dunes of Steel]] in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
